# About this practice


<br />

This tutorial describes the basic workflow showing how to compute step by step
functional diversity (FD) indices in a multidimensional space. It is divided in 
four parts:

* 1 - Compute trait-based distances & the multidimensional functional space 

* 2 - Using the `mFD` package to compute FD alpha and beta indices and plot them ([Magneville _et al._ 2021](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/ecog.05904))

* 3 - Using the `funrar` package to compute Functional Rarity indices ([Violle _et al._ 2017](https://www.cell.com/trends/ecology-evolution/fulltext/S0169-5347(17)30038-1?_returnURL=https%3A%2F%2Flinkinghub.elsevier.com%2Fretrieve%2Fpii%2FS0169534717300381%3Fshowall%3Dtrue))

* 4 - Using the `funbiogeo` package to computes analyses in functional biogeography ([Violle _et al._ 2014](https://www.pnas.org/doi/full/10.1073/pnas.1415442111))
